review: Excellent wifi reception.  Very intuitive user interface.  Opens up a world of streamable content to you TV.  Can't beat the value.
author: Jack B Nimble

review: Having a lot of fun exploring with this stick.
author: Kindle Customer "PugsValley"

review: Great device! Just what I wanted!
author: Daniel

review: I've got them all. Apple, Chromecast, and Roku. Of them all I really like this one. Biggest reason I bought this one was the advertised feature whereby you can use this in hotels with guest wireless that requires a login. Haven't had a chance to try this yet but feedback from others is this works great. Needs more apps to fully compete with Apple TV and Roku but if you want a small form factor with good steaming, travel, and or are a Prime member this device is fantastic and at a great price point.
author: Rob T

review: Constantly resets, does not save personal login info for more than a few days and sometimes take a few minutes just to boot up. I bought 2 at Staples for $24.99 each last Black Friday. Not nearly has good as the Roku 2 and Apple TV that I have as well.
author: Kim Huynh
